definitions: the branch of science that deals with the identification of the substances of which matter is composed; the investigation of their properties and the ways in which they interact, combine, and change; and the use of these processes to form new substances.
shortDefinitions: branch of science concerned with substances of which matter is composed, investigation of their properties and reactions

definitions: the chemical composition and properties of a substance or body
shortDefinitions: chemical composition and properties of substance or body

definitions: the complex emotional or psychological interaction between two people

examples.text: their affair was triggered by intense sexual chemistry

shortDefinitions: complex emotional or psychological interaction between people
